titles.title: VA Act of 2018

To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to notify qualifying veterans of a covered change of service reducing or eliminating a medical service provided at a medical facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
VA Act of 2018
Veterans Awareness Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Veterans Awareness Act or VA Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to carry out a pilot program under which a qualifying veteran shall be notified of a change of service reducing or eliminating a medical service provided to such veteran at a medical facility of the VA.
